backend/main.mo: Defines the main backend canister with authorization mixins, domain types, and state maps for users, products, orders, carts, coupons, referrals, Stripe sessions, and site settings.
feature_evidence.json: Contains structured feature evidence reports mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, and related test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten short summaries of numerous frontend files including hooks, layout components, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS layers and light/dark theme CSS variables for UI styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry document setting the root mount point and loading the React application.
frontend/README.md: Project README describing the BISAULI Store frontend, its features, setup steps, and development prerequisites.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the full routing tree using TanStack Router, including public, profile, checkout, and admin routes wrapped with theme and i18n providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/StripePaym: Admin form to configure Stripe secret key and allowed countries with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/home/BannerCarou: Displays a looping carousel of static banner images.
frontend/src/components/home/CategoriesG: Fetches and displays product categories in a grid with skeleton loading and navigation.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with header, footer, loading state, and document title setup.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders footer with copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Top navigation bar with branding, search, auth handling, theme/language controls, and cart count.
frontend/src/components/LoadingSkeletons: Provides reusable skeleton loading components for product cards, grids, categories, and order rows.
frontend/src/components/product/ProductC: Shows a product card with image, price, stock status, and add-to-cart logic.
frontend/src/components/product/ProductI: Displays a product image with a fallback placeholder and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/queryClientKe: Provides centralized React Query keys for all data entities.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAuthz.ts: Queries user role and admin status from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCartWishli: Handles cart and wishlist queries plus add-to-cart mutation with cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCatalog.ts: Fetches products and categories from the catalog API with optional filters.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCoupons.ts: Fetches all coupons using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useOrders.ts: Fetches customer orders and individual order details with polling.
Retrieves referral user IDs for the authenticated user.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useSiteSettin: Gets and updates site settings while enforcing BISAULI branding.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useStripe.ts: Stripe hooks using react-query to check configuration status and update Stripe settings via admin actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminActor.ts: Initializes an anonymous admin actor on mount and exposes it with a fetching state.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentTitle.ts: Updates the document title to a provided value or a default.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, storage, status tracking, and context via an AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Wraps next-themes to expose theme, setter, and dark-mode flag.
frontend/src/i18n/index.tsx: Implements a simple i18n system with English and Hindi translations and context-based access.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base/theme definitions including light and dark mode CSS variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint setting up QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategories: Admin view listing categories with basic loading and count display.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCouponsPag: Admin page showing available coupons with simple loading and count info.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard displaying placeholder metrics for orders, revenue, and products.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayoutPage: Admin layout with sidebar navigation and an outlet for nested admin pages.
Empty file placeholder for the admin login page.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Displays admin order management stub with a placeholder card.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Provides product search, sorting, and listing UI using catalog query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSiteSettin: Handles viewing and updating site branding settings including logo upload and validation.
User management placeholder page with basic layout.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Cart page displaying user cart items, subtotal, and checkout flow with identity checks.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Displays product catalog with filters, sorting, and synced URL search params, fetching products and categories.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Renders checkout flow with cart summary, payment method selection, and simulated order placement.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows homepage with banner, categories, and featured products fetched from the catalog.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays confirmation message for a placed order with navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/orders/MyOrdersPage.t: Displays a loggedâ€‘in user's order list with status, totals, and navigation to details.
frontend/src/pages/orders/OrderDetailsPa: Shows detailed information for a specific order including items, totals, and status.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows payment failure notice and links to retry checkout or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Shows successful payment message with options to view orders or continue shopping.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Displays detailed product info with add-to-cart and wishlist actions, handling loading and stock states.
frontend/src/pages/profile/AddressesPage: Placeholder page for managing user addresses.
frontend/src/pages/profile/ProfileLayout: Profile layout with auth check and tabbed navigation for profile sections.
Provides user preference controls for theme and language selection.
frontend/src/pages/WishlistPage.tsx: Shows user's wishlist products or prompts login, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routes), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Defines project state, goals, architectural notes, and known issues, mainly focusing on admin authentication removal and enforcing the 'BISAULI' branding.
